players.name: Bob
memory: You: "Alice was killed, so she was town. That means mafia is among Diana, Charlie, and me. We need to discuss carefully."
Diana: "I investigated Charlie and he is the mafioso. We should vote him out immediately."
Charlie: "I am the mafioso, but I didn't kill Alice. That's why I can't be immediately voted out."
You: "I am voting for Charlie. Diana's investigation confirms he is mafia, and his own admission supports this."
Diana: "Charlie admitted he is mafia. We must vote him out now to win."
Votes: Bob voted for Charlie, Charlie voted for Diana, Diana voted for Charlie
